archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Categorize Service Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process is responsible for categorizing the service problem according to the type of the problem, impact, and standardized criteria at SM&O level. Moreover, this activity will be carried out with appropriate diligence, in order to provide inputs to the "Track & Manage Service Problem" process. Extended Description This process is responsible for categorizing the service problem according to the type of the problem, impact, and standardized criteria at SM&O level. Moreover, this activity will be carried out with appropriate diligence, in order to provide inputs to the "Track & Manage Service Problem" process. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory
